text: Fantasia Among the Squares is a 1971 French film. It was directed by Gérard Pirès and stars Lino Ventura, Jean Yanne and Mireille Darc. Alain Delon has a cameo. The French title was Fantasia chez les ploucs. It was based on a novel by Charles Williams and was set in Alabama, USA. ==References== ==External links== * Category:French films Category:1971 films Category:French-language films Category:Films based on American novels Category:Films set in Alabama
title: Fantasia Among the Squares
